name: George Nees, 8-ecke alternative version 1
description: Build opon the original by adding opacity changes and more chaos.

name: George Nees, 8-ecke alternative version 2
description: Breaks the grid of the original and adds change in stroke width to add a sense of depth.

name: George Nees, 8-ecke alternative version 3
description: Created a filled shape from the random lines, giving it a camouflage look.

name: George Nees, Schotter Original recreation
description: Made using grids, randomness, and percentages.

name: George Nees, Schotter alternative version 1
description: Plays with the scale and creates a more 3D effect on the shapes.

name: George Nees, Schotter alternative version 2
description: Implements perlin noise to the grid and adds a 'motion blur' like effect.

name: Erick Calderon, Chromie Squiggle alternative version 1
